page_analysis.text_content:
Light well & stairwell standards
& site planning

Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

Interior lot example

Rear yard

• Such features may not be located on the side of the struc-
ture that faces the front yard.

• Maximum width (interior dimension) is 3'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening
excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features
may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.

• Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max
(however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot
line).

• Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening
excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features
or portions of features that encroach into the required
yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.

• Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring
trees.

• Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

width

3' min.
from lot
line (Typ.)

Lightwells & stairwells
• a + b (enroaching features) may not exceed 15'
• a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of
the perimeter of the basement

Note: measurments are based on interior dimension of
opening and exclude encasing structure.

42

visual_elements.description: A site plan illustrating an 'Interior lot example' with a 'Main dwelling' and 'Buildable area'. It shows various dimensions and setbacks for light wells and stairwells. The diagram includes labels for 'Rear yard', 'Interior-side yard', 'Front yard', and specific measurements like '3' max. width', '3' min. from lot line (Typ.)', and '3' max. into side yard (Typ.)'. Several features are marked with letters 'a', 'b', 'c', and 'd' which represent different light well/stairwell encroachments. The dwelling is shown in a darker grey, the buildable area in a lighter grey, and the light wells/stairwells in black and white.
visual_elements.location: Right side of the page, spanning top to bottom

visual_elements.description:
A legend for the site plan diagram, defining various line types and shaded areas:
- Solid thin line: Curb
- Dashed thin line: Lot line
- Patterned grey rectangle: Sidewalk
- Dashed line with longer dashes: Required setbacks
- Light grey shaded area with dashed border: Buildable area
- Dark grey shaded area: Dwelling
- Black shaded area: Lightwells & stairwells
- White shaded area: Lightwells, & stairwells that encroach into the required yards

technical_specifications.parameter: Combined length (interior dimensions of opening excluding encasing structure) of all excavated features
Allowable encroachment into required side yard
Minimum distance of feature from side lot line
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard
Combined length (interior dimensions of opening excluding encasing structure) of all excavated features or portions of features that encroach into required yards (all sides of structure)
Combined length of encroaching features (a + b)
Combined length of all features (a + b + c + d)
technical_specifications.unit: percent of the perimeter of the basement

structural_elements.main_heading: Light well & stairwell standards & site planning
sections: Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

additional_notes: Page number '42' is present at the bottom left.
The note 'Note: measurments are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.' applies to the 'Lightwells & stairwells' section.
cross_references: Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

qualifiers.text: (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure)
(however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line)
or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure

conditions.text: Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.
conditions.threshold_value: located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard

conditions.text: The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.
Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max (however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line).
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.
Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.
a + b (enroaching features) may not exceed 15'
a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement
conditions.unit: percent of the perimeter of the basement

conditions.text: Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

logical_relationships.expression: IF 'Allowable encroachment into required side yard' THEN 'feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line'

execution_sequence.action: Evaluate combined length of all excavated features relative to basement perimeter
Evaluate allowable encroachment into required side yard and its minimum distance from lot line
Evaluate allowable encroachment into required rear yard
Evaluate combined length of excavated features or portions encroaching into required yards
Evaluate potential harm to neighboring trees by excavated features
Evaluate combined length of encroaching features 'a + b'
Evaluate combined length of all features 'a + b + c + d' relative to basement perimeter
